ing: 1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets, drained and diced
des: "This was a quick simple recipe powered by a desire to have a delicious summer salad with what I had on hand. I also love beets!!"
ins: Mix beets, watermelon, and cilantro together in a bowl. Whisk sour cream, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl; pour over beet mixture. Toss to coat. Refrigerate 30 minutes before serving.
